name: donor
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in an ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased.
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Indicate the cause of a donor's death.
fields.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

fields.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
fields.name: survival_time

meta.notes: Survival_time is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

fields.name: primary_site
fields.description: The text term used to describe the primary site of disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O). This categorization groups cases into general categories.

codeList: Bones, joints and articular cartilage of limbs
Bones, joints and articular cartilage of other and unspecified sites
Connective, subcutaneous and other soft tissues
Other and ill-defined sites in lip, oral cavity and pharynx
Other and ill-defined sites within respiratory system and intrathoracic organs
Other and unspecified female genital organs
Other and unspecified major salivary glands
Other and unspecified male genital organs
Other and unspecified parts of biliary tract
Other and unspecified parts of mouth
Other and unspecified parts of tongue
Other endocrine glands and related structures
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system
Spinal cord, cranial nerves, and other parts of central nervous system

fields.description: The code to represent the cancer type of a prior malignancy using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.
fields.name: cancer_type_prior_malignancy

fields.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate age at previous diagnosis, in years.
fields.name: age_at_prior_malignancy

fields.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE: 4122391)
fields.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy

fields.description: Indicate the donor's height, in centimeters (cm).
fields.name: height

fields.description: Indicate the donor's weight, in kilograms (kg).
fields.name: weight

fields.description: Indicate the donor's Body Mass Index (BMI) in kg/mÂ².
fields.name: bmi

fields.description: Indicate the donor's menopause status at the time of primary diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 2434914)
fields.name: menopause_status

fields.description: Indicate the donor's age of menarche, the first occurrence of menstruation.
fields.name: age_at_menarche

fields.description: Indicate the number of pregnancies a donor has had.
fields.name: number_of_pregnancies

fields.description: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed.
fields.name: number_of_children
